pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, October 29, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Premier of Alberta, Jason Kenney.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Mayor of Edmonton, Don Iveson.

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will virtually meet with President of the European Council Charles Michel and President of the European Commission Ursula von der Leyen.

10:40 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a virtual joint press conference with President of the European Council Charles Michel and President of the European Commission Ursula von der Leyen.

The press conference will be streamed live at: https://video.consilium.europa.eu/en/webcasts

1:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will virtually visit a grade 7 science class at Redcliff Middle School in Valley, Nova Scotia, with Member of Parliament for Cumberland–Colchester Lenore Zann.

1:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will virtually visit Glutenberg and Oshlag breweries, located in Montreal, with Member of Parliament for Hochelaga Soraya Martinez Ferrada.

Closed to media.
